metadata.title: CVE-2022-21540 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Vulnerability in the Oracle Java SE, Oracle GraalVM Enterprise Editionproduct of Oracle Java SE (component: Hotspot). Supported versions that areaffected are Oracle Java SE: 7u343, 8u333, 11.0.15.1, 17.0.3.1, 18.0.1.1;Oracle GraalVM Enterprise Edition: 20.3.6, 21.3.2 and 22.1.0. Easilyexploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with networkaccess via multiple protocols to compromise Oracle Java SE, Oracle GraalVMEnterprise Edition. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result inunauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Java SE, Oracle GraalVMEnterprise Edition accessible data. Note: This vulnerability applies toJava deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Startapplications or sandboxed Java applets, that load and run untrusted code(e.g., code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox forsecurity. This vulnerability can also be exploited by using APIs in thespecified Component, e.g., through a web service which supplies data to theAPIs. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-21540` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openjdk-8-demo - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-jdk - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-jdk-headless - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-jre - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-jre-headless - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-jre-zero - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-source - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
No subscription required

openjdk-11-demo - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-jdk - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-jdk-headless - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-jre - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-jre-headless - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-jre-zero - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-source - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
No subscription required

openjdk-17-demo - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-jdk - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-jdk-headless - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-jre - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-jre-headless - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-jre-zero - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-source - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjdk-8 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04').
icedtea-web package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-lts package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04').
openjdk-13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by openjdk-17').
openjdk-16: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by openjdk-17').
openjdk-17 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '17.0.4+8-1~20.04').
